text: NGC 1491 is a bright nebula in the constellation of Perseus. It is also known as LBN 704. ==Image gallery== File:N1491s.jpg|Adam Block/Mount Lemmon SkyCenter/University of Arizona ==References== == External links == * Category:Emission nebulae Category:Perseus (constellation) 1491 Category:Star- forming regions Category:Sharpless objects
title: NGC 1491
